name: feat2surf
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: Resamples Feat statistics onto the surface of the subject and onto a stereo-taxic surface atlas.

inputs.description: Directory where Feat results are stored. Can specify multiple directories.
inputs.name: Feat directories

inputs.description: File with a list of Feat directories.
inputs.name: Feat directory file

inputs.description: Sample functional a fraction of the cortical thickness normal to the surface. Default is 0.
inputs.name: Projection fraction

inputs.description: Run on specified hemisphere (lh or rh) only. Default is both hemispheres.
inputs.name: Hemisphere

inputs.description: Subject used to define common surface space. Default is fsaverage.
inputs.name: Target subject

inputs.description: Surface to resample to. Default is white.
inputs.name: Surface

inputs.description: Only map the copes and varcopes to the common surface space
inputs.name: Cope only flag

inputs.description: Do not create a log file
inputs.name: No log flag

inputs.description: Output directory to use instead of default feat/reg_surf-?h/stats.
inputs.name: Output directory

output-files.description: Output statistics on the left hemisphere for the subject
output-files.name: Left hemisphere output

output-files.description: Output statistics on the right hemisphere for the subject
output-files.name: Right hemisphere output

output-files.description: Output statistics on the left hemisphere for the target subject
output-files.name: Left hemisphere target output

output-files.description: Output statistics on the right hemisphere for the target subject
output-files.name: Right hemisphere target output
